design.appearanceSpecification: The landing page should have a vibrant and playful aesthetic, utilizing a color palette dominated by shades of yellow, green, and brown, reminiscent of bananas. A clean and modern font will be used throughout. The overall feel should be energetic and optimistic.
design.blueprint:
- Hero Section:
  - Large, eye-catching headline
  - Engaging subheading
  - High-quality image or animation of a stylized banana
  - Call-to-action button
- Features Section:
  - Three distinct feature blocks, each with an icon, title, and brief description.
  - Icons should be simple and banana-themed where appropriate.
- About Us Section:
  - Short paragraph introducing the company and its mission.
  - Possibly an image of the team or a relevant graphic.
- Contact Section:
  - Contact form with fields for name, email, and message.
  - Submit button.
design.functionalitySpecification:
The landing page will serve as the primary entry point for potential customers and partners.

1.  **Hero Section Interaction:** The call-to-action button will link to the contact section or a signup form (if applicable).
2.  **Feature Exploration:** Users can read about the company's core offerings. No direct interaction with feature blocks themselves is required on this page, but they should be visually distinct.
3.  **Contact Form Submission:** Users can fill out the contact form to send a message. Upon submission, a confirmation message should appear briefly, or the form should reset.
design.name: BananaTech Landing Page

kids.description: Hero section with a headline, subheading, and a call-to-action button.
Large, eye-catching headline for the landing page.
Engaging subheading to complement the headline.
kids.text: Experience the convenience of farm-fresh bananas, delivered right to your doorstep.

kids.description: High-quality image or animation of a stylized banana.
Call-to-action button to encourage user engagement.
A group displaying three features, each with a title and description.
About Us section with descriptive text.
Contact form section with input fields for name, email, message, and a submit button.

value.value: Innovating the future, one banana at a time.
We source the finest ingredients for our revolutionary products.
Harnessing the power of advanced research and development.
Committed to eco-friendly solutions for a better tomorrow.

BananaTech is a forward-thinking company dedicated to revolutionizing the tech industry with innovative and sustainable solutions. Our mission is to create products that are not only cutting-edge but also accessible and beneficial to everyone.
